reasoning: Chocolate cyst is a descriptive term for ovarian endometrioma (blood-filled cyst). Same entity as endometrioma but specifically ovarian. Prevalence slightly lower than general endometrioma as it specifies ovarian location (~600 per 100k).
source: Giudice LC et al. (2004). Endometriosis. Lancet. 364(9447):1789-1799
